text: Selling my 2018 Yt Tues Carbon in XL frame size. The bike still has its OEM signature tyres on as 'proof' of the mileage(or lack thereof)This puppy also has had a full service done by TheBikePark in Constantia Uitsig and both fork and shock has been serviced by Omnico (still have the receipts).
